mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV034QMapper.selectLoadSttcList */
SELECT AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,VIEW_YN ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,STTC_COL4 FROM( SELECT AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,VIEW_YN ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,STTC_COL4 FROM( SELECT AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,VIEW_YN ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,STTC_COL4 FROM( SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '0' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) || '년' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '1' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '재정경제감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '2' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '산업금융감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '3' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '국토환경감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '4' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '공공기관감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '5' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '공공재정회계감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '6' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '사회복지감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL
UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '7' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '행정안전감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '8' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '외교국방감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '9' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '미래전략감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '10' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '특별조사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '11' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '지방행정감사1국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL
UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '12' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '지방행정감사2국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '13' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '디지털감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '14' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '국민제안감사1국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '15' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '국민제안감사2국' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '16' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '심사관리관' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '17' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '기획조정실' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '18' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '심의실' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '19' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '적극행정공공감사지원관' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '20' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '비서실' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '21' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '감찰관' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '22' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '대변인' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '23' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '인사혁신과' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '24' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '운영지원과' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '25' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '감사교육원' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '26' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , '감사연구원' AS STTC_TIT1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 FROM DUAL ) T1 ) ORDER BY AUD_YR DESC, CASE WHEN ROW_KND_CD = '0' THEN 999 ELSE TO_NUMBER(ROW_KND_CD) END )
UNION ALL SELECT T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,CASE WHEN (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(T2.AUD_YR)) FROM TWFAACAV200D T2 WHERE T2.STTC_CLSF_CD = '034' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '034' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL)) = T2.AUD_YR AND T2.ROW_KND_CD = '0' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END VIEW_YN ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,T2.STTC_COL4 FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '034' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '034' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL) AND T2.AUD_YR BETWEEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -25),0,4) AND SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt},-13),0,4)

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.arp.dao.FAACAV034QMapper.selectSttcList */ SELECT T1.RMK ,T1.ADM_OPIN ,TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_PROD_STAD_DY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_DTM_DY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS STTC_DTM_YN ,T2.STTC_TYP_CD ,T2.STTC_CLSF_CD ,T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ,T2.STTC_DATA_SNO ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,T2.STTC_COL4 ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR = T2.AUD_YR THEN 'Y' WHEN T1.STTC_YR -1 = T2.AUD_YR AND T2.ROW_KND_CD = '0' THEN 'Y' WHEN T1.STTC_YR -1 = T2.AUD_YR AND T2.ROW_KND_CD = '28' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END VIEW_YN ,T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,NVL(TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_DTM_DY,'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD'),'미확정') AS STTC_DTM_DY FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '034' AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = #{sttcTypSeq} ORDER BY STTC_DATA_SNO
mapper.insert:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV034QMapper.insertMaster */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200M ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_YR ,STTC_STR_MON ,STTC_END_MON ,STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,STTC_DTM_DY ,RMK ,ADM_OPIN ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '10' ,'034' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '034' ) ,SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 0, 4) ,'01' ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1)), 'MM') ,#{proStadDt} ,'' ,#{rmk} ,#{admOpin} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV034QMapper.insertDetail */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200D ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_DATA_SNO ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,STTC_COL4 ,AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '10' ,'034' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '034' ) ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_DATA_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200D WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '034' AND STTC_TYP_SEQ = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '034' )) ,#{sttcTit1} ,#{sttcCol1} ,#{sttcCol2} ,#{sttcCol3} ,#{sttcCol4} ,#{audYr} ,#{rowKndCd} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )
